context: Airbnb is the global leader in alternative accommodations with 7M+ listings. The company expanded into Experiences and faced regulatory challenges in major cities limiting short-term rentals.

competitors.name: Booking.com
competitors.notes: Largest OTA with growing vacation rental inventory

competitors.name: Marriott/Hilton
competitors.notes: Hotel chains with loyalty programs and home rental offerings

competitors.name: Homes & Villas by Marriott
competitors.notes: Premium home rentals from hotel giant

competitors.name: Google Travel
competitors.notes: Aggregating vacation rentals in search results
